excerpt.rendered:
Here is The Macallan 50 Year Old.
Matured for half a century in seasoned sherry oak from Spain and bottled at 44%, this promises to be an outstandingly rich and complex whisky. As there are only 200 bottles ever produced, this bottle is highly coveted by whisky connoisseurs and collectors across the globe. For more pictures or details on worldwide delivery, please email to: orders@simplywhisky.sg.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 50
Vintage : 
ABV : 44.00%
